en.appSubtitle: All-in-One Platform for Life in Korea
en.description: Integrated Platform for Tax, Visa, Medical & Labor for Foreigners
en.taxDesc: Year-end tax filing and refund service
en.visaDesc: Manage stay status and visa extensions
en.chatbotWelcome:
Hello! ğŸ‘‹
I'm K-Resident Care Bot.
How can I help you?
en.onboarding.start.1: Welcome. Let's get started with K-Resident One.
en.onboarding.tax.2: We'll help you with year-end tax filing and refunds.
en.taxSummary: Simplify year-end tax filing and refunds for foreigners in Korea with AI auto-calculation and multilingual guidance.
en.taxCheck5: Success-based fee (only charged on successful refund)
en.taxTrust: Prevent foreign tax arrears and non-filing issues with proactive alerts. Minimize disadvantages from language/regulation gaps.
en.visaHeadline: Manage Visa Expiry & Stay Risks Proactively
en.visaSummary: Automatically manage visa requirements and stay periods by type, with step-by-step guidance for extensions and changes.
en.visaCheck1: Auto-alerts at D-90 / 60 / 30 before visa expiry
en.visaCheck2: Required document checklist by visa type
en.visaTrust: Prevent illegal stay and penalty risks. Integrated stay management linked with tax and labor history.
en.medicalSummary: From foreigner-friendly hospital search to symptom explanation, interpretation, and escort - full medical support.
en.medicalCheck2: Language-based hospital filters (English, Chinese, Vietnamese, etc.)
en.medicalTrust: Prevent medical misunderstandings and overtreatment. Minimize communication issues even in emergencies.
en.laborSummary: Easily verify and respond to labor contract, wage, industrial accident, and wage arrears issues based on foreigner standards.
en.laborCheck2: Calculate wage, overtime, night shift allowances
en.laborCheck3: Wage arrears & industrial accident response guide
en.laborTrust: Strengthen foreign worker rights protection. Systematically manage evidence and procedures before/after disputes.
en.serviceMessage:
K-Resident One is an integrated platform for Korean life
that helps foreigners reduce inconvenience and supports voluntary tax payment, legal residence, and stable employment.
